data.name: Cats are Liquid - A Better Place - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The original soundtrack of Cats are Liquid - A Better Place, a 2D platformer about a liquid cat and her friends.

Made by Silent Tonality. All 13 tracks from the game are included (with additional high-quality FLACs available). Most tracks are remakes of music from A Light in the Shadows but made to sound, you know... good. Headphones recommended.

"Well you really don't wanna listen to this in mono. Reverb? Dead. Soundscape? Dead. Does everything die? Kinda."
— Silent Tonality (when asked if headphones should be recommended)
